sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from "react" import Inputfield from "../common/Textfield" import Button from "../common/Button" import "./signup.scss" import Video from "../utlis/Videos.mp4" class Signup extends Component { state = { name: "", password: "", password1: "", email: "" } ChangeHandaler = e => { const target = e.target const name = target.name const value = target.value this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { return (
